summary: THE MULTIFUNTION SWITCH THAT CONTROLS THE HEADLIGHTS AND WIPERS STARTED TO SMOKE AND BURNED OUT.  MY WINSHIELD WIPERS CAME ON AND I LOST MY LOW BEAM HEADLIGHT.  IN THE PROCESS OF REPLACING THE SWITCH I FOUND THE WIRING AND PLUG TO BE BURNED AND MELTED.  ONE WIRE HAD ABOUT 3/4 INCH INSULATION MISSING.  THE MULTIFUNCTION SWITCH AND WIRE LUME NOW HAVE TO BE REPLACED AT A COST OF $200.
